channel.title: [Rep++] Having Equipment Issues, Need Solved Badly
channel.description:
Alright, so im having this wierd problem. When you equip a helmet your head will disappear. If you have a cape on, it will also disappear. Remove helmet, cape reappears. Im not sure if its client or server side but i will be posting both so someone can help fix.
If you fix this, i will give you rep, plus I will give you my server and client in it's final release when it's ready. Both open source. No questions asked.
Just start up the server and the client and get a helmet and a cape. And see what i Mean. I need this problem fixed asap. [b]THIS IS AN ORIGINAL 317.
Client Download: [/b]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/103983828/FoxscapePRO%20-%20Client.zip[b] Server Download: [/b]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/103983828/FoxscapePRO%20-%20Server.zip
PS. I think theres a byte not matching or a wrong int. Im not sure and I cant get fucking Rune-Server do a damn thing.

item.title: [Rep++] Having Equipment Issues, Need Solved Badly
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I have an idea of the problem, but I’m not sure if I understand correctly. Does this happen with any helmet and cape combination, or just specific ones?

Read full topic
